name: retro-crt-startpage
description: Throwback retro CRT style layout for a personalized startpage.
author: George Merlocco
__NOTE__: HOST should be '0.0.0.0' if running via Docker, and feel free to change the numeric PORT value here as well

scripts.docker-build: gulp release && docker build . -t retro-crt-startpage:$npm_package_version && docker build . -t retro-crt-startpage:latest
scripts.docker: npm run docker-build && docker run -d -p $npm_package_port:$npm_package_port -v retro-crt-startpage_data:/usr/src/app/build/data --name retro-crt-startpage retro-crt-startpage:latest
